ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared
Interface MeasurementJobContainer

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
MeasurementCompositeJob, MeasurementScriptingJob, MeasurementTask
public interface MeasurementJobContainer
extends java.rmi.Remote

Author:
langmo

Method Summary
 MeasurementFocusingJob addAutoFocusingJob(double position, int adjustmentTime)
          Adds a job to the container that sets the position of the auto-focus device.

          Adds a job to the container so that the stage position will be set to /.

          Adds a job to the container so that a composed picture in channel will be made with an exposure time of exposure ms.

          Adds a job to the container which contains other jobs.

          Adds a job to the container so that the devices will be set according to with an exposure time of ms.

          Adds a job to the container that sets the focus of the focus device.
 MeasurementImagingJob addImagingJob(java.lang.String configGroup, java.lang.String channel, double exposure)
          Adds a job to the container so that a picture in channel will be made with an exposure time of exposure ms with the standard camera.

          Adds a job to the container so that pictures in channel will be made with the given cameras and exposure times.

          Adds a job to the container that sets the offset of the auto-focus device relative to its current value.

          Adds a job to the container that sets the focus of the focus device relative to its current value.
 MeasurementScriptingJob addScriptingJob(java.lang.String scriptEngine, java.lang.String script)
          Adds a job to the container which allows for scripting.
 void clearJobs()
          Removes all jobs from this container.
 MeasurementJob[] getJobs()
          Returns a list of all jobs contained in this container.
 

Method Detail

addImagingJob

MeasurementImagingJob addImagingJob(java.lang.String configGroup,
                                    java.lang.String channel,
                                    double exposure)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                           MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container so that a picture in channel will be made with an exposure time of exposure ms with the standard camera.

Parameters:
configGroup - The configuration group where the channel is defined.
channel - Channel in which picture should be made.
exposure - Exposure time (in milliseconds).
Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

addImagingJob

MeasurementImagingJob addImagingJob(java.lang.String configGroup,
                                    java.lang.String channel,
                                    java.lang.String[] cameras,
                                    double[] exposures)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                           MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container so that pictures in channel will be made with the given cameras and exposure times.

Parameters:
cameras - The cameras which should make images.
exposures - The exposure times for the cameras.
configGroup - The configuration group where the channel is defined.
channel - Channel in which pictures should be made.
exposure - Exposure times (in milliseconds).
Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

addComposedImagingJob

MeasurementComposedImagingJob addComposedImagingJob(java.lang.String configGroup,
                                                    java.lang.String channel,
                                                    double exposure,
                                                    double dx,
                                                    double dy,
                                                    int nx,
                                                    int ny)
                                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                           MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container so that a composed picture in channel will be made with an exposure time of exposure ms.

Parameters:
configGroup - The configuration group where the channel is defined.
channel - Channel in which picture should be made.
exposure - Exposure time (in milliseconds).
dx - The distance between two images in the x direction.
dy - The distance between two images in the y direction.
nx - The number of images in the x direction.
ny - The number of images in the y direction.
Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

addDeviceSettingJob

MeasurementDeviceSettingJob addDeviceSettingJob(DeviceSettingDTO[] settingsOn,
                                                DeviceSettingDTO[] settingsOff,
                                                double exposure)
                                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                       MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container so that the devices will be set according to with an exposure time of ms.

Parameters:
settingsOn - Array of device settings for "ON" state.
settingsOff - Array of device settings for "OFF" state.
exposure - Exposure time (in milliseconds).
Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

addFocusingJob

MeasurementFocusingJob addFocusingJob(java.lang.String focusingDevice,
                                      double position,
                                      int adjustmentTime)
                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                             MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container that sets the focus of the focus device.

Parameters:
focusingDevice - The focus device. Set to NULL to use the current active focus device.
position - The new position/offset of the focus.
adjustmentTime - Adjustment time in milliseconds.
Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

addRelativeFocusingJob

MeasurementFocusingJob addRelativeFocusingJob(java.lang.String focusingDevice,
                                              double offset,
                                              int adjustmentTime)
                                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                     MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container that sets the focus of the focus device relative to its current value.

Parameters:
focusingDevice - The focus device. Set to NULL to use the current active focus device.
offset - The offset.
adjustmentTime - Adjustment time in milliseconds.
Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

addAutoFocusingJob

MeasurementFocusingJob addAutoFocusingJob(double position,
                                          int adjustmentTime)
                                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                 MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container that sets the position of the auto-focus device.

Parameters:
position - The new position/offset of the focus.
adjustmentTime - Adjustment time in milliseconds.
Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

addRelativeAutoFocusingJob

MeasurementFocusingJob addRelativeAutoFocusingJob(double offset,
                                                  int adjustmentTime)
                                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                         MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container that sets the offset of the auto-focus device relative to its current value.

Parameters:
offset - The offset.
adjustmentTime - Adjustment time in milliseconds.
Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

addChangePositionJob

MeasurementChangePositionJob addChangePositionJob(double x,
                                                  double y,
                                                  boolean absolute)
                                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                         MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container so that the stage position will be set to /.

Parameters:
x - X-position of the stage.
y - Y-Position of the stage.
absolute - TRUE if x and y values are absolute, FALSE if relative.
Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

addScriptingJob

MeasurementScriptingJob addScriptingJob(java.lang.String scriptEngine,
                                        java.lang.String script)
                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                               MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container which allows for scripting.

Parameters:
scriptEngine - The name of the engine used to interpret the script, e.g. "JavaScript".
script - The string which should be interpreted by the engine.
Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

addCompositeJob

MeasurementCompositeJob addCompositeJob()
                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                               MeasurementRunningException
Adds a job to the container which contains other jobs.

Returns:
The newly created job. If not successful, NULL is returned.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

clearJobs

void clearJobs()
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                      MeasurementRunningException
Removes all jobs from this container.

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

getJobs

MeasurementJob[] getJobs()
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns a list of all jobs contained in this container.

Returns:
List of jobs.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
